Board.name: paratrooper
Board.author: Bruno Coudoin (bruno.coudoin@gcompris.net)
Board.title: Parachutist
Board.description: Help Tux the parachutist land safely
Board.prerequisite: This board is game-oriented. No specific skills are needed to play.
Board.goal: In this game, Tux the parachutist needs help to land safely on the fishing boat. He needs to allow for the wind direction and speed.
Board.manual: Hit any key or click on the plane to make Tux jump. Hit another key or click on Tux to open the parachute.
